name: Leg Curls (sitting)
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at the edge of a seated leg curl machine with your legs stretched out in front of you.
2. Place your feet under the platform, with your heels just above the edge. The lower back support should be adjusted to fit comfortably around your waist, keeping your body straight and stable throughout the movement.

3. Slowly lower your legs down by bending at the knees, keep your upper body still as you curl your legs. 

4. Lower until you feel a stretching sensation in your hamstrings.
5. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement.

6. Finally, push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your knees. Ensure your movements are controlled and that you don't arch your lower back during this exercise.
short_summary: Leg curls with a seated machine work the posterior portion of your upper legs
